'''
ban_addr=ban_addr.split('\n')

ban_id = {}
for add in ban_addr:
  if add != '':
    file = os.path.join('..', 'ZeroNet', 'data', '1Nse6WcodQ5Mj6ZwvZvuyCVvQESwuxbCUy', 'data', 'users', add, 'content.json')
    file = open(file).read()
    ban_id[json.loads(file)["cert_user_id"]] = False
print json.dumps(ban_id,indent=4)
